title: Auto-Post Breaking News Content Using Perplexity AI to X (Twitter)
author: Aitor | 1node.ai
readme:
Stay ahead of the curve and keep your followers informed‚Äîautomatically.  
This n8n workflow uses Perplexity AI to generate insightful answers to scheduled queries, then auto-posts the responses directly to X (Twitter).

* * *

### ‚öôÔ∏è What this workflow does

  1. **Scheduled Trigger** ‚Äì Runs at set times (daily, hourly, etc.).
  2. **searchQuery** ‚Äì Define what kind of trending or relevant insight you want (e.g. ‚Äúlatest AI trends‚Äù).
  3. **set API Key** ‚Äì Securely insert your Perplexity API key.
  4. **Perplexity API Call** ‚Äì Fetches a short, insightful response to your query.
  5. **Post to X** ‚Äì Automatically publishes the result as a tweet.



* * *

### üß© Requirements

  * An [n8n](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/5xf5bs8y3ruv) account (self-hosted or cloud)
  * A [Perplexity API key](https://www.perplexity.ai)
  * A connected X (Twitter) account via n8n‚Äôs credentials

### ‚úÖ Setup Steps

  1. Add this workflow into your n8n account.
  2. Edit the `searchQuery` node with a topic (e.g. ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs new in ecommerce automation?‚Äù).
  3. Paste your Perplexity API key into the `set API key` node.
  4. Connect your X (Twitter) account in the final node.
  5. Adjust the schedule timing to suit your content frequency.
